Our Philosophy

Results-Driven

Every line of code we write is focused on solving problems, driving growth, and delivering measurable outcomes.

Pixel-Perfect Design

We obsess over detail—from typography to transitions—ensuring your site feels refined and built with care.

Scalable Tech

From startups to enterprises, we build scalable infrastructure and systems that grow with you.

Game-changing Web Development services

Professional web development, based on brand new technologies and supportive services, provides a diversity of solutions tailored to your business processes, challenges, and requirements.

Web development

Magpie developers create websites and web apps with feature-rich and functional interfaces. We use reliable technology stack and frameworks.

UI/UX design

We enable the user-centric approach to the interfaces. Our UX/UI designers create accessible, bright, and goal-focused interface designs.

Website Review | Optimizations

Are you not satisfied with your current website. We are happy to review, audit, and update your website for design flaws, improper use of typography, color profile, speed optimization and complete reset if you want. Modernize your website.

SEO services

Magpie web developers together with SEO-specialists build SEO-ready websites technically perfect for search engine crawling.

Other services Magpie excells in

Our goal is to provide best training for new programmers with experienced and professional teachers. Our branding and marketing department also excells in branding and social media marketing and boosts. We also want to raise our Nepal's IT sector by training the youth of our country.

Software Training and Internships

Learn from our professional and highly experienced developers who want to improve the web development and related skills of the whole country by teaching them soft and hard skills required for successful development career. If you want to learn programming or want to intern in our company, contact us.

Social Media Marketing and Boosts

Learn from our professional and highly experienced developers who want to improve the web development and related skills of the whole country by teaching them soft and hard skills required for successful development career. If you want to improve your reach in social medias and boost customers, you can contact us.

Cyber Awareness Programs

We have a goal to improve the IT sector as well as increase the cyber awareness of all individuals. Our trained trainers and educators get joy out of conducting these awareness events in government offices, businesses, schools, universities, villages, etc. If you want to conduct these events, please contact us.
